product_name: LOOPSDew Crew Hydrogel Face & Eye Mask 3 Piece Set
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeDew Crew by LOOPS includes 2 specially formulated hydrogel face masks and 1 hydrogel eye mask. This set features Double Take to glow, Dew Cloud for ultra hydration, and Weekly Reset Under Eye to rejuvenate — your ultimate trio for dewy, refreshed skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsDew Cloud: Ultra Hydrating, Deeply Moisturizing Enhances Skin Barrier, Restores Youthful SkinDouble Take: Extra Glow, Brightening, Pore Refining, CalmingWeekly Reset: Hydrating, Brightening, Helps Reduce Wrinkles, NourishingFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragrancesDrying AlcoholMineral OilIncludesDew Cloud Ultra Hydrating Hydrogel Face MaskDouble Take Glow Hydrogel Face MaskWeekly Reset Under Eye Ultra Hydrating Eye MaskItem 2643886How To UseStart by cleansing skin and gently patting dry.Tear package at notch to open.Apply the textured side of the mask to face, starting with the top half and then bottom.Peel off remaining film. Leave on for a LOOP (10 minutes), then peel off.Tap remaining serum into skin for full ingredient absorption.Use only as directed.IngredientsDouble Take: Water (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Propanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Chlorphenesin, Allantoin, Cellulose Gum, Glucomannan, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Chloride, Sodium Polyacrylate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Dextrin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Cassia Angustifolia Seed Polysaccharide, Phenoxyethanol, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Pueraria Thunbergiana Root Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 40 (CI 16035), Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730).Dew Cloud: Water (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Kaolin (CI 77004), Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose, Distearate, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Allantoin, Cellulose Gum, Glucomannan, Glyceryl Stearate, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Chloride, Caprylyl, Glycol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Dextrin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Ceramide NP, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Niacinamide, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Squalane, Centella Asiatica Extract, Beta-Glucan, Sucrose Palmitate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Linoleic Acid, Tremella Fuciformis (Mushroom) Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera, (Grape) Seed Oil, Honey Extract, Cellulose, Retinol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglutamic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid.Weekly Reset Under Eye: Water (Aqua/Eau), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Propanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Polyglycerin-3, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Panthenol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Allantoin, Betaine, Xanthan Gum, Chlorphenesin, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Cellulose Gum, Glucomannan, Disodium EDTA, Potassium Chloride, Dextrin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Niacinamide, Tocopherol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Pearl Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polysorbate 20, Retinol, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Impatiens Balsamina Flower Extract, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Iron Oxides (CI 77491).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start by cleansing skin and gently patting dry.Tear package at notch to open.Apply the textured side of the mask to face, starting with the top half and then bottom.Peel off remaining film. Leave on for a LOOP (10 minutes), then peel off.Tap remaining serum into skin for full ingredient absorption.Use only as directed.
ingredients: Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid.Weekly Reset Under Eye: Water (Aqua/Eau)

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love the variety and that it has eye patches. Just got in the mail and already has been used.

reviews.headline: The trio your skin wants!
reviews.comments: Hydrating, glowing, dewy, brightening so much deliciousness in one set for your skin in one box. 2 masks and an eye mask! Set to go! The guesswork has been taken out of it along with all the yucky stuff you don't want on your skin!

reviews.headline: A glow up in 15 minutes
reviews.comments: I absolutely loved this set! Super refreshing and hydrating—perfect for a quick reset. The masks stay in place, feel cooling on the skin, and leave my face looking plump and glowy. A fun little self-care moment I'll definitely repurchase!

reviews.headline: Best face mask set ever!!
reviews.comments: I love this set beccause it gives you a variety in the different face masks and loops beauty sells. The masks give so much hydration to my face. They give you glowy, glass skin in minutes. The eye masks are just as hydrating. They dont slip or fall off like normal eye masks.

reviews.headline: Great hydrogel variety pack to try out Loops!
reviews.comments: Ive tried out all these products from Loops individually but this set features three of their best products from the lineup specifically for dewy hydrated skin. Would make for a great gift, a great way to sample or just to have a few faves stocked up!

reviews.headline: Favorite!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite product ever! It's very affordable and works!

reviews.headline: In my skincare routine
reviews.comments: Haven't tried this product yet but heard really good things about it

reviews.headline: Amazing set
reviews.comments: When I seen this new set, I knew I needed it. It had both of my favorite masks. And the price is good. These masks make my skin look so nice and glowy. I love them so much. They are both so relaxing and cooling

reviews.headline: So Hydrating!
reviews.comments: Love the Dew Crew, 3 of my favorite masks from Loops. They're all so hydrating and calming for when my skin feels irritated. Love that it comes in a bundle now. So hydrating and brightening!

reviews.headline: My fave masks in one multipack!
reviews.comments: I swear by Loops — their masks are the first brand I've ever tried that *actually* seems to work on my dry skin. This Dew Crew set is a godsend if you're wanting that glass skin look. Snag this ASAP!!

reviews.headline: Wowwwwww
reviews.comments: Amazing product, definitely a repurchase alwayssss

reviews.headline: A must-have
reviews.comments: This hydrogel mask is extremely moisturizing and feels wonderful on the skin after use. The set includes a reset under-eye treatment, making it a must-have.

reviews.headline: Perfect to try for dewy skin
reviews.comments: I have multiples of each but this is prefect to try to cater to dewy skin and to give as a gift to a friend. Once you try, you'll be hooked and want to try other products from loops.

reviews.headline: Love!! ♥️
reviews.comments: I love these face masks and am so excited to get them together in a bundle now! The dew cloud is perfect to use right before bed after a long day, double take I put on in the morning for extra glow, and the eye patches to hydrate and wake up under my eyes in the morning!

rollup.name: Dew Crew Hydrogel Face & Eye Mask 3 Piece Set
